ValidationRule.description: US-0008843 - [NA] Migrate NA Deals Validation Rules to Hive
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Deal_V2', OR( SellersDealPriceMSKULower__c > SellersDealPriceMSKUUpper__c, SellersOfferPriceMSKULower__c > SellersOfferPriceMSKUUpper__c, ListPriceMSKULower__c > ListPriceMSKUUpper__c ), NOT($Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Upper SKU fields must have a larger than than the Lower SKU fields
